template.title: Descriptive Title of Your Image
template.description: A brief description of what's in the image
template.section: Choose from: HOME, BABIES, KIDS, MATERNITY, FAMILY, FINE ART, MEN'S PORTRAITS, SMALL EVENT, MENTIONS, BLOG
template.blogPostId: (optional - only if this belongs to a blog post)

instructions.step1: Save your image to the appropriate /images/[section]/ folder
instructions.step3: Fill in all the required fields
instructions.step4: Add the entry to /data/images.json in the 'images' array
instructions.step5: Increment the id number (find the highest img-XXX and add 1)

example.title: Sweet Dreams - Emma's Newborn Session
example.description: Peaceful newborn portrait with soft natural light in neutral tones
